mapper.select: select count(1) from cz_nuclearrelease_sku where totalMailNo = #{totalMailNo} and totalid = #{totalid}
select * from cz_nuclearrelease_sku where totalMailNo = #{totalMailNo} and totalid = #{totalid} and billcode = #{billcode}
select billcode,status from cz_nuclearrelease_sku where totalMailNo = #{Nid} and totalid = #{Nnid}
select billcode,status from cz_nuclearrelease_sku where billcode = #{billcode}
